about.title: About Me
about.description1: I'm a self-taught Front-End Developer with basic knowledge of Back-End Technology.
about.description2: I'm a well-organized person, problem solver with high attention to detail that specializes on React.
about.description3: Coding is a passion that motivates me to learn and improve my skills day by day, either with my team or on my own.
